examples.example: 我的梦想是有朝一日能够去国外领略不同的风土人情。

translate.english: My dream is that one day I can go abroad to appreciate different customs.

examples.example: 我希望有机会去国外游览那些美丽而神秘的地方。

translate.english: I hope to have the opportunity to travel to foreign countries to visit those beautiful and mysterious places.

examples.example: 我打算在未来去国外体验不一样的生活，拓展自己的视野。

translate.english: I plan to go abroad in the future to experience a different life and expand my horizons.
